skillTree.localised_description: When one spends his life killing one thing, he becomes exceptionally good at it.

skillTree.localised_description: A true Lord knows the Underway, his Dwarfhold and how to fight under the ground better than anyone.

skillTree.localised_description: This stubborn Dwarf refuses to yield or tire, and ensures his followers are of the same ilk.

effects.description:
Vigour loss reduction: -15%

skillTree.localised_description: This Lord belts out orders and can be heard even across a battlefield smothered in the grim noise of war.

skillTree.localised_description: The endless courage of the Warrior God, directed to bolster this Dawi’s own reserves.

effects.description: Missile resistance: 10%

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

skillTree.localised_description: King Belegar's cause is one all the Dawi can get behind - the Karaz Ankor *will* rise again.

effects.description: Diplomatic relations: +5 with Dwarfs
Global recruitment duration: -1 turn(s) (minimum 1)

skillTree.localised_description: The undertaking of Belegar swells the hearts of most Dwarfs, inspiring some to take up axe and hammer.

effects.description: Recruit rank: +2

Local recruitment capacity: +2
	(local province)

skillTree.localised_description: Powerful oaths have been spoken by Belegar; he will not give up, for the rage within is strong.

effects.description:
Oathgold from buildings: +50%
	(local province)

Leadership: +3 when in foreign territory
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +12
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Lightweight, compact or simply equipped with the right tools for the job, Belegar's forces are particularly experienced in underground warfare.

effects.description:
Ammunition: +200% Miners units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +5 for Rangers, Bolt Throwers and Miners units

skillTree.localised_description: Belegar's vengeful ancestors impart an ember of their ancient rage within his forces, driving them to feats of incredible stalwartness.

effects.description:
Unlocks Hero recruitment: Thane
	(all provinces)
Hero capacity: +2 for Thanes

Physical resistance: 10%
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: "I came here hoping to take it all back. I came hoping to look upon the far deeps, on the ancestor statues of the Abyss of Iron’s Dream..."

effects.description: Campaign movement range: +10%

Construction cost: -50% for settlement buildings
	(factionwide)
Ability: "Shattering Aura" during siege battles

skillTree.localised_description: Full-Plate armour protects the wearer from head-to-foot. Many such suits are blessed or imbued with arcane abilities.

effects.description: Armour: +6

skillTree.localised_description: Dwarfs are resolute - once they commit to charging the foe, they put all their strength behind that initial blow.

effects.description: Charge bonus: +7
Charge bonus: +15

skillTree.localised_description: Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.

effects.description: Melee defence: +6
Melee defence: +12

skillTree.localised_description: The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.

effects.description: Hit points: +7%
Hit points: +15%

skillTree.localised_description: All Dwarfs despise the Greenskins, for the urki and grobi are the prime agents in the Times of Woe.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +7% when fighting against Greenskins
Weapon strength: +15% when fighting against Greenskins

skillTree.localised_description: From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.

effects.description: Ability: "Foe-Seeker"

skillTree.localised_description: Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +10%
Weapon strength: +20%

skillTree.localised_description: This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.

effects.description: Melee attack: +6
Melee attack: +12

skillTree.localised_description: A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.

effects.description: Melee defence: +6
Melee defence: +12

skillTree.localised_description: Dwarfs are not fast, yet they will soldier on, always moving despite any hazards encountered.

effects.description: Speed: +7%
Speed: +15%

skillTree.localised_description: The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.

effects.description: Ability: "Deadly Onslaught"

skillTree.localised_description: There are Lords that radiate power, confidence and fear, inspiring their followers to great or terrible acts.

effects.description:
Unit experience gain per turn: +75
	(Lord's army)
Character's aura leadership effect: +5

skillTree.localised_description: A Lord and his az are never separated, for it is as much part of him as his beard.

attributes.bullet_text: When bracing, this unit negates the charge bonus of any attacker.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.

factionEffects.localised_description: Before the loss of the Eight Peaks, Belegar’s Ancestors were the kings of the nigh-impregnable fortress for many generations. The Angrund Clan is steeped in centuries of military understanding and has a keen eye for the particulars of siege warfare.

effects.description: Upkeep: +50%% until Karak Eight Peaks is recaptured
Starts with four Clan Angrund ancestor Heroes
Unique building chain available at Karak Eight Peaks
Leadership: +10 when laying siege or encircling
Attribute: Vanguard Deployment during Underway battles
